ygData.subject: Star Rubies
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, Doing the crafted quest for some gauntlets.  Where is a good place for a Barbarian Warrior to buy the Star Rubies?  I am currently in High Hold Pass, and
ygData.messageBody:
OK,

Doing the crafted quest for some gauntlets. Where is a good place for a
Barbarian Warrior to buy the Star Rubies? I am currently in High Hold Pass,
and would like to try and avoid the Death trap that is Kithicor Forest, so I
am hoping there is a place to buy them on this side of the Continent. I
appreciate any help.


LefGrebo Halasson
Warrior of 20 Seasons
Mith Marr
